txt.en: 'We have done it! The obelisk has been destroyed!'
'Look, down there! That obelisk must be the source of the frenzy and corruption upon the beasts!'
'There are gredbyg down here as well.'
'The only way to that obelisk is to defeat what is inadvertently guarding it!'
'Excellent, the giant grodbog has been defeated! Keep at it!'
'The large deep-claw has been defeated! Great work!'
